title: FCC sets gears in motion for new C-band auction
summary: The FCC voted today to move forward with a Notice of Proposed Rulemaking (NPRM) that examines a range of options for an auction of at least 100 megahertz and possibly up to 180 megahertz of upper C-band spectrum.
